Core MCP protocol types and data structures

Types

JsonRpcError = object
  code*: int
  message*: string
  data*: Option[JsonNode]
Source   Edit   
JsonRpcId = object
  case kind*: JsonRpcIdKind
  of jridString:
    str*: string
  of jridInt:
    num*: int
Source   Edit   
JsonRpcIdKind = enum
  jridString, jridInt
Source   Edit   
JsonRpcNotification = object
  jsonrpc*: string
  params*: Option[JsonNode]
Source   Edit   
JsonRpcRequest = object
  jsonrpc*: string
  id*: Option[JsonRpcId]
  params*: Option[JsonNode]
Source   Edit   
JsonRpcResponse = object
  jsonrpc*: string
  id*: JsonRpcId
  result*: Option[JsonNode]
  error*: Option[JsonRpcError]
Source   Edit   
McpCapabilities = object
  experimental*: Option[Table[string, JsonNode]]
  logging*: Option[JsonNode]
  prompts*: Option[McpPromptsCapability]
  resources*: Option[McpResourcesCapability]
  tools*: Option[McpToolsCapability]
Source   Edit   
McpClientInfo = object
  name*: string
  version*: string
Source   Edit   
McpContent = object
  case kind*: McpContentType
  of TextContent:
    text*: string
  of ImageContent:
    data*: string
    mimeType*: string
  of ResourceContent:
    resource*: McpResourceContents
Source   Edit   
McpContentType = enum
  TextContent = "text", ImageContent = "image", ResourceContent = "resource"
Source   Edit   
McpGetPromptResult = object
  description*: Option[string]
  messages*: seq[McpPromptMessage]
Source   Edit   
McpPrompt = object
  name*: string
  description*: Option[string]
  arguments*: seq[McpPromptArgument]
Source   Edit   
McpPromptArgument = object
  name*: string
  description*: Option[string]
  required*: Option[bool]
Source   Edit   
McpPromptHandler = proc (name: string; args: Table[string, JsonNode]): Future[
    McpGetPromptResult] {.async.}
Source   Edit   
McpPromptMessage = object
  role*: McpRole
  content*: McpContent
Source   Edit   
McpPromptsCapability = object
  listChanged*: Option[bool]
Source   Edit   
McpResource = object
  uri*: string
  name*: string
  description*: Option[string]
  mimeType*: Option[string]
Source   Edit   
McpResourceContents = object
  uri*: string
  mimeType*: Option[string]
  content*: seq[McpContent]
Source   Edit   
McpResourceHandler = proc (uri: string): Future[McpResourceContents] {.async.}
Source   Edit   
McpResourcesCapability = object
  subscribe*: Option[bool]
  listChanged*: Option[bool]
Source   Edit   
McpResourceTemplate = object
  uriTemplate*: string
  name*: string
  description*: Option[string]
  mimeType*: Option[string]
Source   Edit   
McpRole = enum
  User = "user", Assistant = "assistant", System = "system"
Source   Edit   
McpServerInfo = object
  name*: string
  version*: string
Source   Edit   
McpTool = object
  name*: string
  description*: Option[string]
  inputSchema*: JsonNode
Source   Edit   
McpToolCall = object
  name*: string
  arguments*: Option[JsonNode]
Source   Edit   
McpToolHandler = proc (args: JsonNode): Future[McpToolResult] {.async.}
Source   Edit   
McpToolResult = object
  content*: seq[McpContent]
  isError*: Option[bool]
Source   Edit   
McpToolsCapability = object
  listChanged*: Option[bool]
Source   Edit
